title: Stunning 3 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath End Unit Townhouse For Rent!
description: pectacular end unit townhome with stunning view of trees and your own fun side patio. Located in the highly sought after community of Carriage Hill/Doylestown. This very special home features 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths with a full finished basement. When you walk in you are greeted by tons of natural light from the living room bay window as well as Beautiful hardwood floors, Crown Molding and a Cozy Fireplace. This open concept home allows for a wonderful space to enjoy family time or entertaining. The gourmet kitchen has beautiful upgraded 42" cabinets, quartz countertops, island, pantry, stainless steel appliances and the refrigerator is included. The dining area is open to the living room and kitchen and has sliding doors to your private patio providing lots of light. Upstairs you are greeted by 2 levels. Level 1 has two bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The primary suite is located on this floor and has trey ceilings, a large walk in closet, and beautiful ensuite bath. This upgraded bath features stunning mirrors, double sink vanity, walk in shower and linen closet. Down the hall is a convenient second full bath with upgraded tile and finishings. The second bedroom is ample in size and also features a walk in closet. Level 3 brings a 3rd bedroom. Larger in size this room could be used as a second living area, office space, private guest suite or whatever the needs may be. It has a separate space as well that would allow for both a bedroom and office space if desired. The Basement is nicely finished and offers plenty of room for a media room, additional office or play room. Making this basement even more special is a separate finished laundry room that surely would make doing laundry more delightful. Finished with Beautiful tile flooring, built in cabinets and shelving with a large folding ledge located the entire length of the room. Washer and Dryer included! Located In the back of the neighborhood is Hanusey Park. This park is a dream with walking trails, basketball courts, soccer fields and a playground. Located close to 313, 611 and 202 as well as shopping and restaurants just down the road. Doylestown borough with its quaint style is only minutes away. Award winning Central Bucks Schools. No Pets and No Smoking. Good credit and income a must.

title: Welcome to Shackamaxon Court, a gated courtyard community of 18 boutiq
description: Welcome to Shackamaxon Court, a gated courtyard community of 18 boutique condos in a quaint and tranquil enclave in the heart of vibrant and bustling Fishtown. Situated just steps from some of the city's best restaurants, cafes, galleries and boutique shopping but tucked away just off the beaten path, this unit has all the elements to live simply and beautifully without compromising location. In keeping with the aesthetic of the neighborhood, this development is an adaptive reuse of an historic building with every detail considered to retain its integrity. Renowned Fishtown artist Robert Phillips' custom hand-crafted iron gates greet you as you enter the garden courtyard. Unit #9 boasts a well-designed floor plan with bright, airy rooms and tons of natural light in this one bedroom, one bath corner unit. Find find gleaming hardwood floors, recessed lighting and tasteful finishes. The kitchen is open to the living room for easy entertaining and features stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and walnut cabinets. A lovely bedroom offers a vaulted ceiling and skylight and plenty of closet space. The bathroom is outfitted with custom glass and ceramic tile, a bowl sink and Moen fixtures. Other features include a high efficiency Sanyo heat pump, in-unit laundry and additional secure storage in the basement. A delightful sanctuary, the common courtyard is the perfect place for a cup of coffee on a cool autumn morning.

title: Beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bath townhome!
description:
Amazing home for available for rent! This beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bath townhome sits on a quiet side street in Center City! The home has been recently renovated with a brand new kitchen and two new bathrooms. Walk into the main living area with gleaming hardwood floors, recessed lighting and a fireplace. The large chefs kitchen features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a large center island, along with a sliding glass door that leads to your quaint, fenced-in outdoor space. There is also a private, gated alleyway that serves as excellent storage space for kids toys, strollers, gardening supplies, bikes, or whatever else you may need! The second floor has 2 bedrooms, each with good natural light, and a newly renovated bathroom. Next, make your way up the third floor where you’ll find the master suite, with tons of natural light and a fireplace! The master bath includes a frameless glass walk-in shower and double vanity sink. You’ll also have the convenience of a basement with storage space and a washer/dryer. Additional perks include new hardwood floors, high ceilings throughout, central air, and ample closet space throughout the home. Enjoy living in beautiful Washington Square West! This neighborhood is an urban residential oasis with a tight-knit community, offering a thriving food scene and tons of great shops. You’re conveniently located just minutes from all that Center City has to offer. Walk to the lovely Seger Park in just 5 minutes, and you’re less than a mile from Washington Square Park. Tons of nearby transportation options, grocery stores, convenience stores and awesome restaurants. Local favorites include Giorgio on Pine, Double Knot, Bud & Marilyn’s, Sampan, Vetri Cucina and more. Schedule your showing today!

title: Spaciousness of true loft living! Welcome home!
description:
Welcome to Lofts 640 in the heart of Philadelphia, PA! Your monthly rent includes extended cable TV service, access to our fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with an attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant and more! As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. The original character of the building has been enhanced by modern accents and furnishings, creating a unique and sophisticated environment. Our community is vibrant and welcoming, with state-of-the-art amenities designed to nurture both body and spirit. You'll love relaxing in our glass-domed pool house, where the warm salt water pool and Jacuzzi spa offer the perfect respite from the stresses of daily life. Meet and socialize with fellow residents on our rooftop deck lounge, or take advantage of our cyber cafe and yoga studio to stay connected and centered. Our lobby is a work of art, featuring geometric ceiling lights that illuminate the mocha-colored floors. With stunning white and stainless steel accents, the lobby is the perfect introduction to the energy and excitement of Loft 640. Located just six blocks from City Hall on Broad Street, our community is centrally located to shops, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center are just minutes away. Living at Loft 640 is the perfect combination of the commuter convenience of center city living and the spaciousness of true loft living. Welcome home!

title: This home has 4 bedrooms with 3.5 custom bathrooms
description:
Welcome to this BRAND NEW CONSTRUCTION home in Philadelphia. This gorgeous home boast all the bells and whistles needed for modern living. This home has 4 bedrooms with 3.5 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood floors, recessed lighting, recessed lighting, speakers, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, alarm system, fire-sprinkler system, and much more. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious living room. Past the living room you enter into an open eat-in kitchen, half bath, pantry and dining area. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with quartz counter-top, center island with accent light fixture, SS appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), custom backsplash, and soft close cabinets. Following the kitchen is the entrance to the spacious concrete backyard. The 2nd level of the home presents two amazing sunlit rooms, a laundry room and a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set. Following the staircase to the 3rd level you enter to your own private oasis and also a wet bar area. The 3rd floor has the master suite with a spacious bedroom with custom lighting, modern bathroom and 2 spacious closets! Take another step up the stairs to the rooftop deck where you have a stunning 360-degree view of the City. The home has an electrical outlet, a water line and also speakers on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished lower level has a full bathroom, utility closet and another spacious bedroom. This location is in close proximity to Center City, University City, Bus routes, and so much more! Pets case by case. Tenant is responsible for utilities.

title: 443A
description: Attention all renters! Are you ready for a different renting experience? Where you will receive a hands-on approach and personal attention from your landlord? If so, you have come to the right place! Welcome to 443 Fairmount Ave. #A! A quiet, single building with only 5 units, where your landlord owns and manages the property. Days of your maintenance requests sitting untouched are over. Here, your needs and requests will be met in a timely manner. Now let's take a deeper dive into the unit. 443A is a nicely remodeled, bi-level apartment in Northern Liberties! This 2-bedroom, 1.5 bathroom features a modern open-concept living and dining space throughout the first floor. The open floor plan boasts a contemporary feel with a large living space with gorgeous wood flooring and an open kitchen equipped with sleek white cabinets, granite countertops, and stylish backsplash. The kitchen also features newer appliances and a breakfast bar with 3+ bar stool spots! Also, there is a half bath conveniently located on this floor. The second floor is home to two great size bedrooms, a full bathroom and a FULL SIZE washer and dryer! The first bedroom features an exposed brick accent wall, really providing character to the space, 2 large closets and a loft space! The 2nd bedroom, equal in size, has a large walk-in closet and loft space! The full bathroom is very spacious and has a stall/tub shower combo and newer finishes! Each room has large windows, keeping the space feeling light and airy! This unit also has a BRAND NEW air conditioner/heating unit that was just installed! Located on the 2nd floor of a 5-unit brick building, this unit is only a few blocks away from all the restaurants and shopping Northern Liberties has to offer including The Liberties Walk! Public transportation is easily accessible via the Market/Frankford Line (the El) and many bus routes, plus minutes from the major highways. Don't just take our word for it; come see this amazing apartment today!

title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
